summary: This is a variation of the Steel Plate Armor that I use. It provides more protection and has a nice shine/luster to it. Great for Knights who like to get their hands dirty while still looking good. Try it out.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

The armor is a heavy armor set that is slightly varied from the vanilla steel plate armor. It has more protection around the waist and legs while keeping your warrior warm with some extra fur on the back.

It's stats are slightly higher than the vanilla steel plate and it can be crafted and tempered normally. Requires "Arcane Smithing" Perk.

Armor Pieces Include:
Cuirass (torso)
Gauntlets (bracers)
Boots
Open-faced Helmet

Installation:
Open rar and place files in your Skyrim data folder. Real simple.


Check out my other mods:

Tundra Hunter Gear ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48990/? )
and
Ancient Nordic Bear Armor ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48997/? )

Credit:
All credit and thanks goes to the makers of Skyrim and the Nexus mod community.
Some of the textures in the images shown are sourced from CABAL's Amidianborn work. The actual files will not contain these textures but will contain the modified vanilla versions.
author: Atomic12
